channel.name: SKY Racing 2 AU
channel.title: Sky Racing 2 Racenight
channel.desc: Thoroughbreds from Istanbul, Bro Park, Selangor Malaysia, Krefeld, Tramore, Seoul, Turffontein; Greyhound Racing from Broken Hill, Rockhampton, Darwin, Yarmouth, Sunderland, Hove, Sheffield, Q Straight; Harness Racing from Hagmyren, Le Mont St-Michel.
